info.name: Habitica Collapse Checklists
info.description: Collapses the checklists of Dailies and To-Dos.
info.additionalInfo: Because the very cool and practical style https://userstyles.org/styles/148844/shrink-your-habitica-tasks by Adilendian didn't shrink the checklists for Firefox anymore, I wrote that little script to make them collapse again.
